name: Bakken - Ski Jumping
description:
Bakken - Ski Jumping is a winter sports simulation game.

To go for gold you have to jump as high as possible, you have to fly as long as possible and
you mustn't forget the telemark landing!

#SkiJumpingIsBack

Features


  • various weather
    (night/no night, snow/no snow)
  • various genders
    (men, women, men/women)
  • various events
    (flying hill*/large hill/normal hill*, individual/team*)
  • various rounds
    (qualification, 1st/2nd/3rd/4th round)

*no Early Access feature
